option.od: print the help message and exit.
print the RST version number and exit.
verbose. Log information to the console.
filename of the fitacf format file to convert. If this is omitted the file is read from standard input

synopsis.p: Converts a fitacf format file to fit format.

description.p: Converts a fitacf format file to fit format.
The fit format data is written to standard output.

example.description: Convert the file "test.fitacf" to the fit format file "test.fit".
